Hero.title: Hosting Without Limits
Hero.subtitle: Take your Digital presence to the next level with our LiteSpeed Hosting plans and experience our 5x faster loading times than competing services. We love to get compared.

DomainSearch.title: Everything starts with a domain name...
DomainSearch.subtitle: Register unique, memorable domains in seconds.
DomainSearch.placeholder: Get the best domain for your website

PricingPlans.title: Web Hosting Plans That Scale With You
PricingPlans.subtitle: Web hosting options designed for speed, uptime, and global infrastructure reliability.

shared_starter.name: Shared Starter
shared_starter.description: The ideal starting point into your digital journey

kraken_web_hosting.name: Kraken Web hosting
kraken_web_hosting.description: For those who demand peak performance – unleash the Kraken in your hosting.

UltraFastHosting.title: The Only Hosting Provider You'll Need
UltraFastHosting.subtitle: All hosting types with the features you'll need. One platform. Ready to deploy, scale, and grow.
UltraFastHosting.feature_title: Up to 20x Faster Than Traditional Web Hosting
UltraFastHosting.feature_description: Your site loads instantly, runs smoother, and ranks higher, thanks to AMD 4.2GHz CPUs, NVMe SSDs, PCIe Gen 5 architecture, 1 Gbps server throughput, and 8+ globally distributed data centers.

security.title: Kraken 360 - Security You Can Trust
security.description: From SSL encryption to DDoS defense and real-time monitoring, firewall protection, Kraken hosting keeps your website safe. Stay online, secure, and always protected.

ssl.title: Free SSL Certificate
ssl.description: We provide a free 'Let's Encrypt' SSL certificate, instantly boosting SEO with Google.

updates.title: Security & Updates
updates.description: We automatically update your instances & their plugins to the latest version & patch against common exploits.

moneyback.title: Money Back Guarantee
moneyback.description: Try our hosting risk-free. If it's not right for you, get a full refund within 30 days.

MigrationServices.title: Free Migration Services
MigrationServices.description: Kraken Hosting is committed to making your website transfer from ANY provider absolutely hassle-free! At Kraken Hosting we want you to get up and running fast. Thats why you get a 100% worry-free, no-cost account migration by our experts.

MigrationSupport.title: 24/7 Live Support
MigrationSupport.description: Struggling? Our hosting professionals are readily available to help you through Live Chat. No matter if it's your first time setting up or an issue needs resolving, we can assist with any Shared Hosting requirement that may arise. Reach out now and let us make the web hosting process easy!

NextGenHosting.title: Next-Generation Hosting Built for Speed and Growth
NextGenHosting.subtitle: One platform with optimized stack, managed security, pro tooling, and 24/7 help to keep your projects moving.

ssd.title: SSD & NVMe Hosting
ssd.description: Experience ultra-fast performance with our NVMe hosting, delivering rapid data access and unmatched reliability.

cache.title: Built-In Cache
cache.description: Boost your site speed with built-in caching. Varnish, Redis, and Memcached work together to deliver faster page loads, lower CPU usage, and smoother performance for all applications.

stack.title: Optimized Stack
stack.description: Our stack includes Apache and NGINX as web servers, PHP-FPM and MySQL/MariaDB as databases for better performance.

php.title: PHP Versions
php.description: We support PHP 5.6.x and the latest versions of PHP 8.x so you can test compatibility and switch versions accordingly.

uptime.title: 99.99% Uptime
uptime.description: True hosting with no single point of failure. Our hosting dynamically move, balance and tune the clients instances to guarantee an extraordinary uptime.

hardware.title: Ultra Optimized
hardware.description: Built on SuperMicro hardware with AMD EPYC 4.2GHz CPUs, offering unmatched performance and redundancy across network, power, and storage.

VisionSection.title: Unleash Your Vision. We Handle the Rest.
VisionSection.subtitle: We know security and integrity are important to you. That's why Kraken Hosting has thought of absolutely everything, so you, our client, can focus on what you do best: your vision, your sales, your message. Let us take care of your website, web hosting and everything in between.

banner.title: Migrate to the Perfect Managed Hosting for Free!
banner.description: Everything associated with your website is perfectly copied, re-installed, and re-configured on your new server, With the least impact to your website and email services.
